questions.describe: Which is a capability of Chatter files? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: View a list of files shared with a Chatter group
Store Chatter posts in a Salesforce Content group
Link a Salesforce Content library to a Chatter profile
Post files from a Salesforce Content library to a Chatter feed

questions.describe: Sales Representatives at Universal containers perform the initial steps in the lead qualification process and sales managers complete the final qualification steps. Universal Containers' requirements are listed below. Sales managers can access all Lead status values. Sales Representatives cannot access the final two lead status values. How can a system administrator meet these requirements?

answerOptions.describe: Create a validation rule to prevent lead conversion
Use field-level security to restrict access to the lead status values
Create two separate lead process and record types
Create two separate page layouts

questions.describe: Universal Containers populates the industry field on each account record. The Vice president of sales would like the industry information on related opportunity records and updated when the value is updated on the account record. How can a system administrator meet his requirement?

answerOptions.describe: Create a cross-object formula field on the opportunity
Create an account workflow rule with an opportunity field update
Create a roll up summary field on the opportunity
Create a cross-object formula field on the account

questions.describe: How can a System Administrator restrict users from viewing certain fields in list views, searches and reports?

answerOptions.describe: Set the field to hidden using field level security
Remove the field from reports and list views
Remove the field from the page layout
Set the field to hidden on the user profile

questions.describe: Which is available when creating list views? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: List views can be filtered by record ownership
List views can be filtered by tags
List views can be filtered using AND, OR and NOT filters
List views can be filtered by record owner profile

questions.describe: When doing a search for reports, what are the only two fields on which one can search?

answerOptions.describe: Created By and Report Title
Report Type and Create By
Report Type and Description
Report Name and Description

questions.describe: When advanced currency management is first enabled, the existing exchange rates

answerOptions.describe: Are left untouched
Are converted to the organization's default currency
Become inactive until an administrator reactivates them
Automatically become the first set of dated exchange rates

questions.describe:
A company has two different sales divisions national sales and international sales. Some of
the processes are the same, but the internal sales organization has more requirements to
gather during the sales process and there are more stages when trying to close deals.

answerOptions.describe: Roles
Page layouts
Record types
Multi‐select picklists

questions.describe:
An administrator is creating two picklist fields: Automobile Manufacturer (Nissan, Ford,
Mercedes‐Benz) and Automobile Model Mustang, S600.
Is it possible to link the two fields together such that the Automobile Manufacturer field
could influence the choices available in the Automobile Model field?

answerOptions.describe:
Yes, the Automobile Manufacturer is a controller picklist, and Automobile Model is a
dependent picklist

Yes, the Automobile Manufacturer is a dependent picklist, and Automobile Model is a
controlling picklist

No, a relationship between the two fields is NOT possible because they are both custom
fields

No, a relationship between the two fields is NOT possible because they are both picklist
fields

questions.describe:
What does the presentation assembly feature do?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Searches and previews slides or presentations
Drag and drop slides or presentations into the assembly pane
Previews slide animations
Edits slide content

questions.describe:
Which statement is true regarding the capabilities of formula fields?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Formula fields are read only on record details pages
Formula fields can reference fields on a child object
Formula fields can reference fields on a parent object
Formula fields can reference themselves in the formula

questions.describe:
Dashboards give the user a snapshot of corporate metrics and key performance indicators. A
dashboard
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Only consists of data from tabular reports
Can only be viewed from the home page
Does not use a standard report as it's source
Can only display information from a single report

questions.describe: What is the process for creating a Custom tab?

answerOptions.describe: Select a custom object, choose a tab style, and create a profile
Select a custom object, choose a tab style, and assign profiles
Select a custom application, choose a tab style, and create a profile
Select custom fields and objects, choose a tab style, and create a profile

questions.describe: In Salesforce, what does an administrator use to control a user's permissions?

answerOptions.describe: Users
Roles
Profiles
Sharing model and rules (granular)

questions.describe: Which objects cannot have sharing rules?

answerOptions.describe: Custom objects
Standard objects
Objects controlled by parent
Objects in a managed package

questions.describe: When a user performs a dashboard refresh, the dashboard refreshes for

answerOptions.describe: The user only
Anyone with the "View All Data" permission
The user and anyone below the user in the hierarchy
The user and anyone who has access to the dashboard

questions.describe:
After a record has been submitted for approval and locked, who may edit that record?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Administrator
Record owner
Currently assigned approver
User who submitted the record

questions.describe: Public groups may be used to do all of the following EXCEPT

answerOptions.describe: Share opportunities with other users
Allow users to delete personal accounts
set up default sharing access via a sharing rule
add multiple users to a Salesforce Content workspace

questions.describe:
Which statement is TRUE when an administrator installs an application from the
AppExchange?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: The administrator may have the ability to test drive the application first
The administrator is able to see all the contents of the package
The administrator can customize the application after it is installed
The administrator cannot set the security for the application being installed

questions.describe:
Which is a custom object relationship type?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Lookup
Master/Detail
One‐to‐Many
Many‐to‐Many

questions.describe: Where are the field level security settings located?

answerOptions.describe: Role
Profile
Page layout
Manage users

questions.describe:
Which are affected by changing the organization locale setting?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Language
Time zone
Date format
Number fields

questions.describe: An administrator may create a lookup relationship between all of the following EXCEPT

answerOptions.describe: From a custom object to itself
From a custom to a standard object
From a standard to a custom object
From the user object to a custom object

questions.describe: Which statement is true when a label on a standard object, such as "Accounts," is renamed?

answerOptions.describe: Online help can be modified to reflect the new name
Pages in the setup area will still use the default, original labels
The API name for the field will also change
The field will no longer appear to users until is enabled, with the new name, in the page layout.

questions.describe: What does the primary object in a custom report type determine?

answerOptions.describe: Whether or not the report is sortable
The type of report that can be built
Whether or not the report can be used as source for a dashboard
The options available in the View pick list when running a report

questions.describe: What are default values for an opportunity record created upon lead conversion?

answerOptions.describe: It is not possible to set any default values for a new opportunity
Only the name of the opportunity and account filled in from the lead conversion page

The opportunity and account name, including the close date defaulting to the end of the
year.
The opportunity and account name, including the close date defaulting to the last day of the quarter and Stage field defaulting to the first value

questions.describe: What can be done with a workflow task that cannot be done with a workflow alert?

answerOptions.describe: Reuse
Notify a user
Track in the activity history
Immediate or time‐dependent

questions.describe:
Which feature can be used to send sales management an email alert when a sales representative qualifies a large deal?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Big deal alert
Workflow alert
Update reminders
Opportunity escalation rule

questions.describe: What is required before an organization can be enabled for territory management?

answerOptions.describe: Unlimited Edition
Client management
Customizable forecasting
At least one account sharing rule

questions.describe: Which of the following is not captured on the user record without the use of custom fields?

answerOptions.describe: Locale
Hire date
Employee number
Delegated approver
